contextId.information: AT: "the vision that he saw concerning the people of Samaria and Jerusalem" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: the word that he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem
All of them will cover their lips

contextId.information: Micah is not referring only to himself. He means the enemy should not rejoice over what happens to all the people of Israel. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
Micah is not only referring to himself. He means all the people of Israel have sinned. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
